titleInfo.title: Letter No. 43 of 1854 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident at Bushire [Resident in the Persian Gulf]

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that he is to confine his interactions with the authorities in Persia to matters of a routine nature; in the event of any emergencies it notes he should be guided by the instructions of HM Charg√© d'affaires at the Court of Persia. It further notes that in the event the Resident is required to quit Bushire, or if diplomatic relations between Britain and Persia cease, his duties respecting the Arabian Coast will continue.
